sentences.sContent: He and Mary journeyed to Bethlehem to be counted in the Roman census, and while they were there the child was born.
sentences.sContent_eng: He and Mary journeyed to Bethlehem to be counted in the Roman census, and while they were there the child was born.
sentences.sCn: 他和玛利亚一起去到伯利恒，罗马的人口普查把他们统计在内。 他们在那里时，孩子降生了。

phrases.pCn: 人口统计局，人口调查局；人口普查局

trans.tranOther: an official process of counting a country’s population and finding out about the people
